sourcesContent:
const About = () => (
My Journey

About Me

Hello! I'm a final-year Software Engineering student with a deep passion for web development. I am driven by the challenge of transforming creative ideas into interactive, beautiful, and user-centric digital experiences.

My core strength lies in frontend development, with a strong focus on modern JavaScript, particularly React and Next.js. I don't just write code; I strive to build high-performance, responsive, and accessible interfaces.

Name: Your Name
Email: your.email@example.com
Location: Your City, Country
Availability: Open to opportunities
); export default About;
